shortdesc.ph: Configurations of the last-mile network test.

p.codeblock: struct LastmileProbeConfig { bool probeUplink; bool probeDownlink; unsigned int expectedUplinkBitrate; unsigned int expectedDownlinkBitrate; };
export interface LastmileProbeConfig { probeUplink: boolean; probeDownlink: boolean; expectedUplinkBitrate: number; expectedDownlinkBitrate: number; }

pd.p:
Sets whether to test the uplink network. Some users, for example, the audience members in a LIVE_BROADCASTING channel, do not need such a test.
: Test.
: Not test.

Sets whether to test the downlink network:
: Test.
: Not test.

plentry.pd: The expected maximum uplink bitrate (bps) of the local user. The value range is [100000, 5000000]. Agora recommends referring to to set the value.
The expected maximum downlink bitrate (bps) of the local user. The value range is [100000,5000000].
